returns._0: The collateral value of a particular account.

getAccountMinimumCollateralValueAtRatio(.details: Accounts that have their collateral value under the minimum collateral value are considered unhealthy,      accounts with their collateral value under the liquidation threshold are considered liquidatable.

params._account: The account to calculate the minimum collateral value for.
params._ratio: The collateralization ratio required: higher ratio = more collateral required

returns._0: The minimum collateral value of a particular account.

params._account: The account to get the index for.

params._account: The account to get the deposited collateral assets for.

params._account: The account to query amount for

getAccountCollateralRatio(address).notice: Get a list of accounts and their collateral ratios

getAccountCollateralValue(address).notice: Gets the collateral value of a particular account.

getAccountKrAssetValue(address).notice: Gets the Kresko asset value in USD of a particular account.

getAccountMinimumCollateralValueAtRatio(.notice: Get an account's minimum collateral value required to back a Kresko asset amount at a given collateralization ratio.

getCollateralRatiosFor(address[]).notice: Get a list of accounts and their collateral ratios

getDepositedCollateralAssetIndex(address.notice: Gets an index for the collateral asset the account has deposited.

getDepositedCollateralAssets(address).notice: Gets an array of collateral assets the account has deposited.

getMintedKreskoAssets(address).notice: Gets an array of Kresko assets the account has minted.

getMintedKreskoAssetsIndex(address,addre.notice: Gets an index for the Kresko asset the account has minted.
